appearance.cybernetics: High-end neural augments visible through glowing cranial seams; right eye replaced with shifting data-reticle; skin has synthetic mesh patterns like cracked obsidian
appearance.clothing: Tattered regal coat reminiscent of ancient royalty fused with corporate uniforms; dark utility armor beneath; long asymmetrical cloak

personality.motivation: Recover lost identity and uncover the truth behind the Dilmun Protocol

dialogue_examples: "King? I can’t even rule my own bloodstream anymore."
"I’m not a hero. I’m just the last bad decision someone made before dying."
"Rebuilt? No. I was *reassembled*—like malware given a second chance."

relationships.Enkidu: Old friend, possible lover, mirror to his past humanity
relationships.Siduri: Temptress, foil, AI oracle with murky motives

appearance.cybernetics: Bio-synthetic muscle lattice, overgrown with moss-like memory foam patches; eyes flicker with corrupted data; barcode tattoo around neck
appearance.clothing: Nomad-street style: weatherproof poncho patched with QR codes, ripped netrunner cargo pants, barefoot with reinforced soles

personality.motivation: Understand what he was before the reboot, and protect Gilgamesh

dialogue_examples: "You called me ‘brother’ once. Before the wires."
"I remember your voice like static in the dark."
"If we were gods... why are we always running?"

relationships.Gilgamesh: Trusts deeply, possibly in love, believes they were once partners
relationships.Siduri: Distrusts her, sees her as a manipulator of truth

appearance.cybernetics: Entirely virtual or projection-based; appears as a silver-haired avatar with shifting facial features—never quite the same twice; eyes like star maps
appearance.clothing: Digital kimono made of flickering data fragments and glitching silk, embedded with corp sigils and forbidden code

personality.motivation: Wants control over the Dilmun Protocol to ensure a ‘cleaner’ evolution of consciousness

dialogue_examples: "Memory is a currency, darling. You’re just overspending."
"What’s one soul in exchange for divine clarity?"
"Even gods need upgrades. You’re no different."

relationships.Gilgamesh: Wants to reshape him into a post-human ideal, sees him as a useful vessel
relationships.Enkidu: Considers him obsolete, emotional debris from a failed project
